name: Beautiful Women of Classic TV Online Trivia | Mixture: Classics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which actress is not from a prominent entertainment family?
questions.explanation:
Angie Dickinson.

	Marlo Thomas is, of course, the daughter of Danny Thomas. Candice Bergen is the daughter of legendary ventriloquist Edgar Bergen. Montgomery, daughter of Robert Montgomery, grew up in Hollywood. Dickinson is from North Dakota

questions.text: Which actress starred in the TV series 'The Farmer's Daughter' with William Windom?
questions.explanation:
Inger Stevens.

	Connie was in 'Hawaiian Eye' and 'Wendy and Me' (with George Burns). Kirk was in 'Thin Man' (with Peter Lawford). Davis was in 'Vegas' (with Robert Urich).

questions.text: This actress had a fine career in movies such as 'Forbidden Planet' and 'Bad Day at Black Rock' before getting into a tv series
questions.explanation:
Anne Francis.

	Francis eventually did 'Honey West'. Ireland was in 'Shane'. Albright was in 'Peter Gunn'. Meriwether was in 'Barnaby Jones'.

questions.text: This actress was once married to movie star Troy Donahue before she became involved in a tv series
questions.explanation:
Suzanne Pleshette.

	Pleshette eventually did 'Bob Newhart'. Fabares was in 'Donna Reed' and 'One Day at a Time'. Feldon did 'Get Smart'. Bain was in 'Mission Impossible'.

questions.text: This actress was a beauty contest winner (Miss Nevada) and also became involved in teaching acting
questions.explanation:
Dawn Wells.

	Wells was in 'Gilligan's Island'. DeWitt was in 'Three's Company'. Jones did 'Addams Family'. Barbeau was in 'Maude'.

questions.text: Which actress starred in the 'Dobie Gillis' tv series with Dwayne Hickman?
questions.explanation:
Tuesday Weld.

	Weld was Thalia Menninger. Saint James did 'Name of the Game', 'McMillan and Wife' and 'Kate and Allie'. Anderson was in 'Ironside'. Post was in 'Fall Guy' and 'Night Court'.

questions.text: This actress was a star of the 'How To Marry A Millionaire' tv series before she was involved in another more well-known series
questions.explanation:
Barbara Eden.

	This was long before 'I Dream of Jeannie'. Reed was in her own show. Hansen was in 'Odd Couple'. Barnes was in 'Three's Company'.

questions.text: This actress was a regular in a tv series that featured Wiliam Shatner in the early days of her career
questions.explanation:
Heather Locklear.

	The show was 'T.J. {Hooker';} she and Shatner were both cops. Thomas was in 'Fall Guy'. Baxter was in 'Family', 'Family Ties' and Bridget Loves Bernie'. The late Macrae was in 'Petticoat Junction'.

questions.text: This actress worked in Shakespearean productions and starred on Broadway (in 'Heloise and Abelard')
questions.explanation:
Diana Rigg.

	Rigg was in 'Avengers'. Bertinelli did 'One Day at a Time'. George was in 'Mission Impossible'.

questions.text: This actress had a short-but-publicized nude scene in 'The Last Picture Show' before she entered series TV.
questions.explanation:
Cybill Shepherd.

	Shepherd was in 'Moonlighting'. Jones was in 'Partridge Family'. Dixon was in 'Bosom Buddies'.
